PresetSelector.Title: Performance Preset Selector
PresetSelector.Notes: Select a preset that best matches your computer's performance. You can change this at any time in the module settings.

Potato.Name: Potato
Potato.Description: Maximum performance. For systems that struggle to run animations.

Balanced.Name: Balanced
Balanced.Description: A good balance between visuals and performance.

Quality.Name: Quality
Quality.Description: Best visual quality. For systems that can handle it.

Notifications.ReloadPromptContent:
Your performance settings have been updated. A reload is required for all changes to take effect.

Do you want to reload now?
